comment: Absolutely amazing cake! The vanilla flavor was perfect and the buttercream frosting was so smooth and delicious. Perfect for my daughter's birthday party. Everyone loved it!
Great cake overall. The size was perfect for our small gathering. Only minor complaint is that it was a bit sweet for my taste, but the kids absolutely loved it.
This cake exceeded my expectations! Beautiful presentation and tasted even better than it looked. The custom message was perfectly written. Will definitely order again!
Our wedding cake was absolutely stunning! The three-tier design was exactly what we wanted and the taste was incredible. All our guests complimented the cake. Worth every penny!
Perfect wedding cake! The attention to detail was amazing and the red velvet flavor was divine. The bakery worked with us to create exactly what we envisioned.
Rich and decadent chocolate cake! My chocolate-loving family was thrilled. The fudge layers were incredible. Only wish it came in a larger size option.
Best chocolate cake I've ever had! The ganache topping was perfect and the cake was so moist. Ordered for my husband's birthday and he was over the moon!
Beautiful red velvet cake for our anniversary! The cream cheese frosting was perfectly balanced and the cake was incredibly moist. Romantic presentation too!
Good red velvet cake with nice flavor. The texture was great and it looked beautiful. Would have liked a bit more cream cheese frosting but overall very satisfied.
Perfect graduation cake! The custom decorations with our school colors were spot on. The funfetti flavor was a hit with all the young graduates. Highly recommend!
Lovely tropical flavors! The coconut frosting was light and the pineapple filling was refreshing. Great for summer celebrations. Could use a bit more tropical fruit flavor.
Amazing lemon cake! The lemon curd filling was the perfect balance of tart and sweet. The buttercream wasn't too heavy. This is now my go-to lemon cake!
My kids absolutely loved this funfetti cake! The colors were so vibrant and fun. Perfect for a children's birthday party. The cake was moist and flavorful.
Great carrot cake! The walnuts and raisins added nice texture. The cream cheese frosting was delicious. Would order again for sure. Maybe a bit less cinnamon next time.
Absolutely gorgeous anniversary cake! The buttercream roses were so detailed and beautiful. The champagne flavor was unique and sophisticated. Perfect for our special day!
